title: UI Playground
intro: A collection of UI challenges and demo interactions. Click a card to view the demo or read the challenge description.

items.title: Glassmorphism Cards
items.description: Blurred cards with layered gradients and hover transitions.

items.title: Animated Navbar Underline
items.description: Recreate a navbar with a shared animated underline that follows hover and active states.

items.title: React Animated Cards
items.description: Interactive cards with hover parallax and spring transitions.

items.title: Flutter List Animations
items.description: Animated list insertions and deletions using implicit animations.
